sentences.english: How shall the ministry of the Spirit not be more in glory?
sentences.chinese: 何况那灵的职事，岂不更带着荣光？

sentences.english: His glory was being nibbled away by years.
sentences.chinese: 他头上的荣光随着岁月的流逝慢慢地失去了光泽。

sentences.english: You can take metro, it is Yonggwang station of Chollima line.
sentences.chinese: 您可搭乘平壤地铁，千里马线，荣光车站。

sentences.english: As a glass reflecting Thy glory.
Radiant beams from Thy holy face, with the dawn of redeeming grace.
sentences.chinese: 救赎宏恩的黎明来到，圣容发出来荣光普照。

sentences.english: There the bright and morning star Sheds its beams around me.
sentences.chinese: 那里有明亮晨星，荣光四面照来。

sentences.english: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.
sentences.chinese: 他剥去我的荣光，摘去我头上的冠冕。

sentences.english: And if what was fading away came with glory, how much greater is theglory of that which lasts!
sentences.chinese: 若那废掉的有荣光，这长存的就更有荣光了。

sentences.english: And if what was fading away came with glory, how much greater is theglory of that which lasts!
sentences.chinese: 若那废掉的有荣光，这长存的就更有荣光了。

sentences.english: Peace in heaven and glory in the highest!
sentences.chinese: 在天上有和平，在至高之处有荣光。

sentences.english: After so many years of neglect and plunder, the past glory of Koguryo is fast disappearing.
sentences.chinese: 经多年之乎视与劫掠，高句丽昔日之荣光正日渐消逝。

sentences.english: Now we also have the honour of serving young general Kim Jong-un.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们为年轻的将军金正恩服务而感到无尚荣光。

sentences.english: His glory you shall see sometime, somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 某时某地你必见祂荣光。

sentences.english: Looking to Jesus till glory doth shine, Moment by moment, O Lord I am Thine.
sentences.chinese: 仰望主耶稣荣光必照临，每时与每刻，我为主子民。

sentences.english: And the glory of the LORD came into the house by the way of the gate whose prospect is toward the east.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的荣光从朝东的门照入殿中。

definition: Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
